com.microsoft.azure.documentdb

Class HashPartitionResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.HashPartitionResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PartitionResolver
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class HashPartitionResolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements PartitionResolver
    HashPartitionResolver implements partitioning based on the value of a hash function, allowing you to evenly distribute requests and data across a number of partitions by implementing PartitionResolver interface in the Azure DocumentDB database service.
